short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Combine power of OpenAI ChatGPT with Major Search Engines.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Performing Google, Bing and Yahoo Search Just Got Easier.

Install “ChatGPT + Google, Bing, Yahoo” Extension to Level Up Your Search. There is NO reason to copy/paste search phrases into ChatGPT anymore.

Feature highlights:

- Perform a search in Google or Bing or Yahoo, results from ChatGPT are displayed in extension window instantly. Both search results and ChatGPT responses are displayed side by side that helps you save time and effort.
- Continue the search with follow-up question in either extension window or Search box in a natural and human-like way.
- Boost productivity by allowing response from ChatGPT to be copied into clipboard or saved into a file with one click.
- Responses from ChatGPT are elegantly rendered through Syntax highlighting.
